Quality Education.reason: The course is fundamentally about providing advanced language education, aiming to 'develop four main language skills at advanced levels' and enable 'academic research paper' writing.

The course provides a wide range of new vocabulary and extended grasp of grammar with the aim to help students can start writing an academic research paper at the end of the course.
Course Name: Advanced Vietnamese
